title: The most important free agent on each of the 6 teams eliminated from the playoffs
text:
The MLB playoffs have just four teams remaining as the Houston Astros will take on the New York Yankees in the ALCS while the Washington Nationals will play the St. Louis Cardinals in the NLCS.

Six teams have been eliminated (including the two that lost in the Wild Card Games). Here is the most important free agent for the upcoming offseason for those six franchises.

A list of free agents were found at MLB.com. Those that have options for 2020 are not included.

Don't miss our page on Facebook!

description: Josh Donaldson and Hyun-Jin Ryu are two impact players that will be on the market in the offseason.
